Value.label: Current Overload Protection
Value.Help: Current Overload Protection. Load will be closed when the Current more than 39.5A and the time more than 5 seconds

Value.label: Notification status
Value.Help: Enables automatic notifications to associated devices whenever there is a state change.

Value.label: Wattage threshold
Value.Help: The minimum change in wattage for a report to be sent.

Value.label: Wattage threshold percent
Value.Help: Minimum change in percent of wattage to send a report.

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 kWh bit 2 watt bit 1 current bit 0 voltage

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 kWh bit 2 watt bit 1 current bit 0 voltage

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 kWh bit 2 watt bit 1 current bit 0 voltage

Value.label: Default Group Time
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send interval G1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send interval G2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send interval G3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
